products.name: Self-Lube DU Bushes
products.design: Maintenance-free composite bearing with steel backing, porous bronze layer, and PTFE lining for self-lubricating operation across extreme temperature ranges (-200 to +280°C).
products.applications: High-load, low-speed, oscillating, or dry-run applications, including automotive, industrial machinery, heavy equipment, and aerospace.
products.features: Maintenance-free, low friction (PTFE liner), wide temp range (-200 to +280°C). Steel backing with porous bronze layer and PTFE lining (often with lead or lead-free) for exceptional wear resistance.
products.differentiator: Eliminates the need for external lubrication, offering high wear resistance, durability, and a compact design.

specifications.materials: Steel backing, porous bronze layer, PTFE (Polytetrafluoroethylene) lining (often with lead or lead-free)

products.name: Oil-Less Graphite Bushes
products.design: High-strength bronze or brass alloy base with embedded solid graphite plugs for self-lubricating performance in extreme conditions up to +450°C.
products.applications: High-load, low-speed, high-temp, or corrosive environments where external lubrication is difficult or undesirable.
products.features: Solid graphite plugs embedded in bronze base. Maintenance-free, high temp (to +450°C), self-lubricating with high load capacity and excellent wear/corrosion resistance.
products.differentiator: Self-lubricating, high load capacity, low friction, wide operating temperature range, and excellent wear/corrosion resistance.

specifications.materials: High-strength bronze or brass alloy with graphite plugs (or entirely carbon graphite)
specifications.forms: Cylindrical sleeves, flanged bushes, thrust washers, sliding plates, half-bearings

products.name: Rod Ends
products.design: Spherical bearing joint available in male (POS) and female (PHS) configurations with left/right hand threads, allowing angular misalignment for flexible linkage connections.
products.applications: Linkages, control rods, steering mechanisms in machinery and vehicles, automotive steering and suspension systems, aerospace controls, industrial machinery, construction equipment, and robotics.
products.features: Male (POS) and Female (PHS) types, L/R hand threads. Spherical bearing allows angular misalignment with options for self-lubricating (PTFE liners), greasable, or metal-to-metal contact.
products.differentiator: Provides an articulating joint with options for lubrication and various thread types, accommodating angular motion and flexibility.

specifications.materials: Steel, stainless steel, composite materials, aluminum, chrome steel, carbon steel
specifications.load_capacity: Varies significantly based on design and materials

products.name: Spherical Plain Bearings
products.design: Self-aligning bearing with spherical contact surfaces designed to accommodate angular misalignment under heavy radial and axial loads, available in maintenance-required (steel-on-steel) or maintenance-free (self-lubricating) versions.
products.applications: A-frames, hydraulic cylinder pivots, heavy equipment linkages, construction equipment, automotive, railway engineering, mining, and aerospace.
products.features: Accommodates angular misalignment under heavy radial and axial loads. Available in radial and angular contact types, and maintenance-required (steel-on-steel) or maintenance-free (self-lubricating) versions with high load capacity.
products.differentiator: Self-aligning components designed to handle high static and dynamic loads with significant angular misalignment.

specifications.materials: High-strength bearing steel, hardened carbon chromium steel, carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminum-bronze (for rings and balls); PTFE, nylon, PTFE fabric, PTFE composite, copper alloy (for sliding surfaces)
specifications.load_capacity: High radial and axial load capacities (static and dynamic)
specifications.lubrication: Maintenance-required versions need periodic lubrication; maintenance-free versions are self-lubricating

products.name: Cam Followers
products.design: Heavy-section outer ring bearing with caged needles specifically designed to handle high radial loads from cam profiles, available in roller, flat-faced, knife-edge, and spherical-faced configurations.
products.applications: Cam mechanisms, conveyor systems, indexing tables, and various applications requiring conversion of rotary motion into linear or oscillating motion.
products.features: Heavy-section outer ring to handle loads from cams. Caged needles, sealed options. Available in roller, flat-faced, knife-edge, and spherical-faced types with factory-filled grease lubrication.
products.differentiator: Robust design specifically for tracking cam profiles with high reliability, offering high radial load capacity.

specifications.materials: Bearing Steel (often with black oxide treatment for corrosion resistance)
specifications.mounting_styles: Stud type (concentric or eccentric), yoke type
specifications.lubrication: Often factory-filled with grease, with options for re-lubrication

products.name: Needle Roller Bearings
products.design: Compact bearing with thin cylindrical rollers (diameter ≤6mm, length-to-diameter ratio ≥1:3) providing extremely high radial load capacity in minimal radial space.
products.applications: Transmissions, automotive applications, universal joints, and applications with limited radial space requiring high load capacity.
products.features: High radial load capacity in a small cross-section. Available in drawn cup, machined, thrust, and combined radial/axial designs. Caged or full complement configurations with hardened steel construction.
products.differentiator: Extremely high load capacity for its size, with a small cross-sectional height.

specifications.size_range: Various bore diameters, outside diameters, and widths
specifications.materials: Hardened steel (for rollers and raceways), stamped steel (for drawn cups)
